title: Delete a transfer run
description: Deletes a transfer run in the BigQuery Data Transfer Service.

objective.narrative: This sample solves the developer problem of needing to programmatically remove individual transfer run records. This is a common maintenance task for cleaning up the execution history of a transfer, such as removing failed, incomplete, or test runs.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_transferrun_delete
regionTags.title: Delete a transfer run
regionTags.description: Deletes a transfer run in the BigQuery Data Transfer Service.
